definition: to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
to spit/to send out (silk from a silkworm, bolls from cotton flowers etc)/to say/to pour out (one's grievances)

sentences.english: No loss is a college student, conversation elegant, every act and every move all seem to be liberal and dignified.
sentences.chinese: 不亏是大学生，谈吐文雅，一举一动都显得落落大方。

sentences.english: American fashion stylists all talk like Californian teenagers.
sentences.chinese: 美国时尚设计师们的谈吐就像加州的小青年。

sentences.english: She is a girl with courteous manners, graceful words, sublimated temper and profound intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 她举止端庄，谈吐优雅，气质高雅，内涵丰富。

sentences.english: Don’t forget to communicate properly and speak clearly.
sentences.chinese: 不要忘了合适的交流和清楚的谈吐。

sentences.english: The man I saw at the party looked and talked like an Amerian.
sentences.chinese: 我在聚会上看见那个人的外表和谈吐像是美国人。

sentences.english: She behaves elegantly , talks culturedly, tempers decently, and connotes abundantly.
sentences.chinese: 她举止端庄，谈吐优雅，气质高雅，内涵丰富。

sentences.english: Students to dress appropriately, sit still stand straight, walk strong, civilized conversation.
sentences.chinese: 学生着装得体，坐正立直，行走稳健，谈吐文明。

sentences.english: The way people comport themselves after losing a job can make all the difference in what comes next.
sentences.chinese: 人们失业之后的举止谈吐会决定未来的求职进展。

sentences.english: He was charming and urbane, full of witty conversation.
His somewhat geekish appearance and soft-spoken manner bespeak his humble roots.
sentences.chinese: 他那质朴的外表和轻柔的谈吐表明了他卑微的出身。

sentences.english: The manner or bearing of a person, especially in conversation.
sentences.chinese: 举止，谈吐一个人的行为或风度，特别是在谈话中。

sentences.english: They are not exhalations like our daily colloquies and vaporous breath.
sentences.chinese: 它们可不像我们的日常谈吐和嘘气如云的呼吸。

sentences.english: Sprinkle in good conversation and witty repartee and you are on to something special.
sentences.chinese: 在谈吐中灵敏机智，挥洒自如让你做到特别。

sentences.english: He was a grey-haired man, with a plausible voice and careful manners.
sentences.chinese: 他一头灰发，谈吐乖巧伶俐，举止小心翼翼。

definition: cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated
to train/to educate/to bring up/to nurture/education/culture/upbringing/early conditioning
